headline.print_headline: German Media Boss Says He's Scared of Google
headline.main: German Media Boss Says He's Scared of Google

docs.snippet: The head of Germany's biggest media company says he is afraid of Google and wants the company to become more transparent....
docs.lead_paragraph: The head of Germany's biggest media company says he is afraid of Google and wants the company to become more transparent.

headline.print_headline: Reynolds Brings Back Susan Cameron as CEO
headline.main: Reynolds Brings Back Susan Cameron as CEO

docs.lead_paragraph: Reynolds American has elected board member and former leader Susan Cameron as president and CEO of the tobacco company.

headline.sub: NATO beefs up eastern European defenses to assure allies
headline.main: NATO beefs up eastern European defenses to assure allies

docs.snippet: NATO's top military commander says the alliance will bolster eastern European defenses to reassure allies on Russia's borders. Deborah Lutterbeck reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: NATO's top military commander says the alliance will bolster eastern European defenses to reassure allies on Russia's borders. Deborah Lutterbeck reports.

headline.print_headline: Holder Urges Use of Overdose-Reversal Drug
headline.main: Holder Urges Use of Overdose-Reversal Drug

docs.snippet: Attorney General Eric Holder on Wednesday urged first responders to use an overdose-reversal drug to help save lives amid a nationwide resurgence in heroin abuse, a public health scourge claiming the lives of celebrities and young people alike....
docs.lead_paragraph: Attorney General Eric Holder on Wednesday urged first responders to use an overdose-reversal drug to help save lives amid a nationwide resurgence in heroin abuse, a public health scourge claiming the lives of celebrities and young people alike.

headline.print_headline: Canadians Bid Farewell to Jim Flaherty, Former Finance Minister
headline.main: Canadians Bid Farewell to Jim Flaherty, Former Finance Minister

docs.snippet: Canada's political elite and hundreds of well-wishers paid final respects to former Finance Minister Jim Flaherty at a state funeral on Wednesday, with Prime Minister Stephen Harper depicting Flaherty as a man who put his own needs aside in the se...
docs.lead_paragraph: Canada's political elite and hundreds of well-wishers paid final respects to former Finance Minister Jim Flaherty at a state funeral on Wednesday, with Prime Minister Stephen Harper depicting Flaherty as a man who put his own needs aside in the service of his country.

headline.print_headline: Bale Stunner Claims Cup Win for Real Over Barca
headline.main: Bale Stunner Claims Cup Win for Real Over Barca

docs.snippet: Gareth Bale raced away to score a stunning late winner as Real Madrid made light of the absence of top scorer Cristiano Ronaldo to beat arch-rivals Barcelona 2-1 to win a riveting King's Cup final on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Gareth Bale raced away to score a stunning late winner as Real Madrid made light of the absence of top scorer Cristiano Ronaldo to beat arch-rivals Barcelona 2-1 to win a riveting King's Cup final on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Philadelphia Using 'Robo-Calls' as Weapon in War on Illegal Signs
headline.main: Philadelphia Using 'Robo-Calls' as Weapon in War on Illegal Signs

docs.snippet: Philadelphia is taking on businesses that blanket its neighborhoods with illegal paper and plastic signs by using automated phone calls to disrupt the operations of people who post them along with contact numbers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia is taking on businesses that blanket its neighborhoods with illegal paper and plastic signs by using automated phone calls to disrupt the operations of people who post them along with contact numbers.
